attributes.action: keep the britannia on the next issue of coins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has approved of coins that represent Britain using
our flora or fauna, geographic features, social, political or
cultural achievements or British institutions", or to interpret
heraldry "in an imaginative and creative way". Using these new designs will take away Britannia from our coins.

Britannia is a symbol of our nation, of our history and of
ourselves. Keeping the Britannia on our coins would allow us
to keep our national identity, whilst new symbols would not.
We urge the prime minister to keep Britannia on all of our
coins which hold her now.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
